messages.subject: RE: [samuraihistory] Last Samurai alternative scenarios - OT/trivia - apologies in advance
messages.msgSnippet: Why, yes it would have, now you mention it.  That s another point in its favour.  Thomas, I hope they let you script the remake.  I vote for the kids getting
messages.messageBody:
Why, yes it would have, now you mention it. That's another point in its
favour. Thomas, I hope they let you script the remake. I vote for the kids
getting him in his sleep.
Gereg

Date: Mon, 13 Dec 2004 16:27:36 +0000
From: burker1@...
Subject: Re: Last Samurai alternative scenarios - OT/trivia - apologies in
advance

Would have made for a very short movie!

Bob Burke

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Last Samurai alternative scenarios - OT/trivia - apologies in advance
messages.msgSnippet: How about TC ship sinks en route to japan. Thomas Davidson  wrote: If anyone s interested, how about some alternative scenes from The
messages.messageBody:
How about TC ship sinks en route to japan.

Thomas Davidson <tom.davidson@...> wrote:
If anyone's interested, how about some alternative scenes from
The Last Samurai?

My favourite would be TC captured and taken to the village, to the
house of the man he has just killed.

TC steps up, the door slams open and Koyuki sinks a short spear
straight down his gullet. She is samurai after all, and this is the
barbarian who just killed her husband.

Alt.alternative is that the kids stab him to death in his sleep.

Roll credits.

Thomas

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Last Samurai alternative scenarios - OT/trivia - apologies in advance
messages.msgSnippet: A RESPONSE; How about he be forced to just watch the tediously dull movie and bore him to death. Though Koyuki doing her Samurai duty to TC would be nice as
messages.messageBody:
A RESPONSE; How about he be forced to just watch the tediously dull movie and bore him to death. Though Koyuki doing her Samurai duty to TC would be nice as well, as long as TC gets killed. The guy cannot act, I don't care what anyone says. He plays Tc playing TC playing TC. The mini-series "Shogun" was done far better. david a sigler.

Thomas Davidson <tom.davidson@...> wrote:
If anyone's interested, how about some alternative scenes from
The Last Samurai?

My favourite would be TC captured and taken to the village, to the
house of the man he has just killed.

TC steps up, the door slams open and Koyuki sinks a short spear
straight down his gullet. She is samurai after all, and this is the
barbarian who just killed her husband.

Alt.alternative is that the kids stab him to death in his sleep.

Roll credits.

Thomas

messages.subject: Last Samurai alternative scenarios - OT/trivia - apologies in advance
messages.msgSnippet: If anyone s interested, how about some alternative scenes from The Last Samurai? My favourite would be TC captured and taken to the village, to the house of
messages.messageBody:
If anyone's interested, how about some alternative scenes from
The Last Samurai?

My favourite would be TC captured and taken to the village, to the
house of the man he has just killed.

TC steps up, the door slams open and Koyuki sinks a short spear
straight down his gullet. She is samurai after all, and this is the
barbarian who just killed her husband.

Alt.alternative is that the kids stab him to death in his sleep.

Roll credits.

Thomas
